executable.description: This program search a given pattern in a given input file.

option.name: -n
option.description: Each output line is preceded by its relative line number in the file, starting at line 1. The line number counter is reset for each file processed. This option is ignored if -c, -L, -l, or -q is specified.

option.name: -h
option.description: Never print filename headers (i.e. filenames) with output lines.

option.name: -i
option.description: --ignore-case Perform case insensitive matching. By default, grep is case sen- sitive.
